s_update_frequency_desc: Frequency in minutes to update the metrics
s_coins_desc: List of coins (symbols) to fetch (e.g.: "BTC, ETH, GRC")
s_currency_desc: The currency to display prices in
m_symbol_desc: The unique identifier or shorthand code used to represent the cryptocurrency
m_name_desc: The official name or title of the cryptocurrency
m_current_price_desc: The most recent trading price of the cryptocurrency on the market or exchange
m_market_cap_desc: The market capitalization is the total value or worth of the cryptocurrency. It is calculated by multiplying the current price of a coin by its circulating supply
m_market_cap_rank_desc: The position of the cryptocurrency based on its market capitalization compared to all other cryptocurrencies
m_total_volume_desc: The cumulative number of units of a cryptocurrency traded within a specified time period, typically within 24 hours
m_high_24h_desc: The highest price reached by the cryptocurrency within the past 24 hours
m_low_24h_desc: The lowest price reached by the cryptocurrency within the past 24 hours
m_price_change_24h_desc: The change in the price of the cryptocurrency over the past 24 hours
m_price_change_percentage_24h_desc: The percentage change in the price of the cryptocurrency over the past 24 hours
m_circulating_supply_desc: The total number of units or coins of the cryptocurrency that are currently in circulation and available to the public
m_total_supply_desc: The maximum or total number of units or coins of the cryptocurrency that will ever exist or be created
m_ath_desc: The All-Time High represents the highest price ever reached by the cryptocurrency since its inception
m_ath_change_percentage_desc: The percentage change in the price of the cryptocurrency from its All-Time High (ATH) price
m_ath_date_desc: The specific date or time when the cryptocurrency achieved its highest price, known as the All-Time High (ATH)
